title: How to Renew a DHCP Lease on a Mac

steps.title: Click on the apple icon on the top left corner of the Menu Bar on the desktop.
steps.content: Click on the apple icon on the top left corner of the Menu Bar on the desktop.

steps.title: Select your network service that provides DHCP.
steps.content: Select your network service that provides DHCP. (Example: Ethernet)

steps.title: Click TCP/IP and select Renew DHCP Lease then select OK.
steps.content: Click TCP/IP and select Renew DHCP Lease then select OK.

steps.title: Type sudo ipconfig set en0 BOOTP
steps.content: Type sudo ipconfig set en0 BOOTP

steps.title: Type sudo ipconfig set en0 DHCP
steps.content: Type sudo ipconfig set en0 DHCP

steps.title: To check your Ethernet IP address type ipconfig getifaddr en0
steps.content: To check your Ethernet IP address type ipconfig getifaddr en0
